DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine bioequivalence letrozole 2.5 mg tablet administration single dos normal healthy Korean subject fast condition .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 19 55 year old Subjects neither congenital chronic disease . Subjects select pass clinical screening procedure include physical examination laboratory test . Availability subject entire study period willingness adhere protocol requirement , evidence sign Informed Consent Form . Any history clinical condition might affect drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion might risk factor , e.g . clinically significant disorder heart , liver , respiratory system , liver , kidney , gastrointestinal system CNS Had history myocardial infarction , stroke , hypertension , arrhythmia , coronary artery disease , disease neuropsychiatry , gastrointestinal system surgery ( exclude appendectomy , herniotomy ) Current clinically significant disorder history take physical examination Acute disease within 14 day precede first application study medication Had relevant allergic disease Had history hypersensitivity drug food Positive Hepatitis B antigen , Hepatitis C antibody , HIV antibody , High Quality Syphilis Reagin Test Excessive caffeine , alcohol intake smoker ( caffeine > 5 units/day , alcohol > 3 units/day ( 1 unit = pure alcohol 10ml ) , cigarettes > 20 cigarette /day ) Subjects excessive alcohol intake drug affect drug metabolism enzyme intake within 30 day precede study History drug abuse positive urinary test drug abuse ( amphetamine , barbiturate , cocaine , opioids , benzodiazepine etc . ) Has donate whole blood within 60days apheresis within 14days precede first application study medication Received investigational drug within 60days precede first application study medication Taken herbal medicine within 30days , prescription medication within 14 day overthecounter drug ( except vitamin , mineral ) within 10days precede first application study medication ( might affect study safety subject judge investigator ) Subjects could n't eat ASAN MEDICAL CENTER standard meal unsuitable study judge investigator
